bio:
Guardian Saerek is a draugr who can be found inside Ragnvald Crypts.
He carries one of the keys reqiored to unlock the sarcophagus of Dragon Priest Otar the Mad. He can be summoned by picking up his skull from the pedestral in the middle of the chamber.
name: Guardian Saerek
notes: Shawn - started. Feel free to change voice model.
